events.message: I just received my order, but the device has a large scratch on the screen and does not power on properly.
The reported issue matches product defect criteria due to the broken screen and malfunction.
Assigning a support agent experienced in handling product defects and hardware issues.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your device. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and confirm if you have tried charging or restarting the device?
I have attached pictures showing the damage, and yes, I’ve tried charging it but it still doesn’t turn on.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement unit at no extra cost or a full refund if preferred.
I would prefer the replacement, thank you. Please let me know the next steps to proceed.
We’ve processed the replacement request and you should receive the new device within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement device arrived in good condition and everything is working well.
Since your replacement device is working perfectly, we have closed this case. Thank you for your patience.
